story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet a seasoned digital marketing professional whose journey spans over two decades, beginning in the bustling world of finance and evolving into digital media leadership. After graduating from Boston College with a Business Administration degree in 1994, they started their career as a Floor Broker at the Chicago Board of Exchange, trading stocks like Coca-Cola and Bank of America.

Their early financial career included roles as an Equity Trading Liaison and Senior Investment Specialist, where they managed high-net-worth portfolios and demonstrated their ability to thrive in fast-paced environments. However, in 2008, they made a pivotal career shift into the emerging field of digital marketing as a Behavioral Targeting Specialist.

The real transformation began in 2010 when they joined as an Account Manager, managing 30+ accounts and leading a team of six analysts. Their talent for optimization and strategic thinking quickly became apparent as they climbed the corporate ladder. By 2014, as Account Director, they were handling major global accounts worth over R$6 million monthly, achieving impressive results like reducing cost per lead by 300% and tripling lead generation while maintaining efficiency.

Their career reached new heights in 2016 when they became Digital Media Solutions Executive Director, leading a team of eight specialists and driving media spend growth by over 100%. Their innovative approach and strategic insight led to the development of the Blinks Media Mix Modeling and earned them an invitation to test Facebook Blueprint Certification's beta version.

Most recently, from 2017 to 2021, they served as Director for Microsoft Digital Advertising as part of a global remote team. Their expertise in performance marketing helped grow project revenue in Brazil from $50,000 to an impressive $3 million in just two years. They've built expertise in multiple languages (English, Portuguese, and Spanish) and accumulated numerous certifications including Google AdWords, Google Analytics, and Facebook Planning Professional.

Their story is one of continuous evolution, from trading floor to digital innovation, marked by consistent growth, leadership, and an ability to drive remarkable results in the ever-changing landscape of digital marketing.
